history.01-01: 2004: Counter-Strike: Source beta announced by Valve.
history.01-09: 2007: Steve Jobs unveils the first iPhone at Macworld.
history.01-14: 2005: Huygens probe lands on Saturn's moon Titan.
history.01-22: 2002: First Xbox Live service goes online for testing.
history.01-31: 2010: Mass Effect 2 releases to universal critical acclaim.
history.02-01: 2003: Valve announces Counter-Strike 1.6, the definitive version.
history.02-10: 1996: IBM's Deep Blue defeats Garry Kasparov in chess.
history.02-22: 2011: Nintendo 3DS launches in Japan with glasses-free 3D.
history.03-03: 2005: World of Warcraft hits 1.5 million subscribers worldwide.
history.03-04: 2004: Half-Life 2 wins 39 Game of the Year awards.
history.03-21: 2006: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey sends the first tweet.
history.03-31: 2005: Sony reveals the PlayStation 3 at E3.
history.04-01: 2004: Gmail launches on April Fools' Day. Nobody believes it's real.
history.04-14: 1999: Napster launches, forever changing digital music.
history.04-29: 2003: The iTunes Music Store opens with 200,000 songs.
history.05-11: 1998: iMac G3 announced by Steve Jobs in Bondi Blue.
history.05-19: 1999: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace premieres in theaters.
history.06-11: 2002: E3 2002 - Xbox Live officially unveiled to the public.
history.07-07: 2003: Valve announces Steam, changing PC gaming forever.
history.07-11: 2008: App Store launches with 500 apps. Now has millions.
history.07-21: 2004: Doom 3 ships, pushing PC graphics to the limit.
history.08-12: 1981: IBM releases the first Personal Computer (IBM PC).
history.08-24: 1995: Windows 95 launches with massive midnight lineups.
history.08-25: 2005: Katamari Damacy wins multiple innovation awards.
history.09-09: 1999: Sega Dreamcast launches in North America on 9/9/99.
history.09-14: 2007: Halo 3 launches. Master Chief finishes the fight.
history.09-20: 1996: The original Resident Evil releases for PlayStation.
history.09-29: 1998: Google founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin.
history.10-25: 2001: Windows XP released. The start screen era begins.
history.10-26: 2015: Back to the Future Part II's future date arrives.
history.11-15: 2001: Xbox launches in North America with Halo: CE.
history.11-16: 2004: Half-Life 2 releases. The gravity gun changes FPS forever.
history.11-21: 2004: World of Warcraft launches. 12 million will be addicted.
history.12-03: 1994: PlayStation launches in Japan, starting a console dynasty.
history.12-21: 1998: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time released.
history.12-25: 2000: Millions of kids unwrap PlayStation 2 consoles worldwide.
